channel.title: Explosion blade from MU, made into runescape version
channel.description:
befor [img]http://globalmuonline.gamersfirst.com/_img/cw_new_items_09.jpg[/img]
after [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2hdwvgx.jpg[/img]
think you can do better? be my guest since this is my first moddle i have finished all by myself
also can someone help me add this into my client? just give me the thing for class 8 that would be great

item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

str, sorry but it’s not the best, what I did is I worked on editing models at first, and they looked awesome because of my imagination and how different it looked from the original. Work on editing first, then start making real models.

item.source: Explosion blade from MU, made into runescape version

item.title: Explosion blade from MU, made into runescape version
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

u need to gzip it, then rename the gzip to a model id u dont use, such as 513-517. vthen add to yourclients model folder.
then after that you open up class 8, c+p say a godsword, then replace the model ids with ur models ids and change the item id. then compile and run. ingame type this:

add model #####
replace the ##### with the model id (NOT the item ID)

Read full topic

item.title: Explosion blade from MU, made into runescape version
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

gimme like 1/2 an hour or so and ill show u what i get. Oh and i like it gratz on not being a recolor noob. with practice ull be a good model creater.

*Edit: heres mine, i made 1st post at 9:20, then finished by 9:56… also had to throw some laundry in the washin machine.

I personally dislike mine because i rushed on it, and the pic was small to see all details.

Oh, and im not makin this to show u up, its rather to show u what can be done after you get used to the program.

Read full topic
